rows.label: tev023501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev023501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Berry about NLA.

rows.label: tev023501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev023501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Berry if she has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev023501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Berry about Mira's oceans.

rows.label: tev023501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Berry about the Earthlife Colonization Project.

rows.label: tev023501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Berry about the city of NLA.

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0001
rows.name:
New LA was nearly complete when we were forced to
crash-land here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Those damned xenoforms couldn't wait just a little
while longer? Ugh! How I loathe them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Anyway, that's why the roads are only partially finished
and lack side barriers to keep people from falling off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0004
rows.name:
I hear someone once fell all the way to the bottom!
Took a whole team of Mediators to rescue him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0005
rows.name:
That reminds me: Kaisis offered to escort me home
that day, but I refused. I could tell he had some
ulterior motive in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0008
rows.name: Oh, you missed quite the brouhaha here the other day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Once again, Kaisis was insisting that I let him escort
me home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I could tell he had something else in mind,
so I flatly refused.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Just then, a Mediator named Tracey came by and
mistakenly assumed from our conversation that he was
trying to abduct me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then she slapped a set of handcuffs on him and tried
to lead him away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0013
rows.name:
No matter what Kaisis said, she wouldn't listen.
She said her "detective's instincts" made it clear that
this was an abduction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0014
rows.name:
Honestly, she seems a little bit...unstable.
I hope she doesn't cause a more serious problem
someday...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Sometimes I log on to research data probes to look at
the views from the Miran coastlines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0021
rows.name:
And on rare occasions, I spot small islands on the
horizon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0022
rows.name:
I wonder if those sorts of islands are scattered
throughout Mira's seas?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0023
rows.name:
I can't imagine many BLADEs have even tried to visit
such isolated places.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0024
rows.name:
So if you were to work up the courage to swim out
there, who knows what sort of treasure you might find?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0026
rows.name:
A great many ships were launched as
part of the Earthlife Colonization Project.
I wonder if the others are safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0027
rows.name:
I mean, what if the Ganglion found them and
destroyed them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0028
rows.name:
...No, I'm sure they're okay. We probably haven't
heard from them because they haven't yet found a
suitable planet on which to land.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0029
rows.name:
I need to toughen up. It's because of these moments of
weakness that Kaisis has such designs on me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0035
rows.name:
I've been complaining to the maintenance teams about
how easy it is to fall here because of the insufficient
guard rails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0036
rows.name:
But I must admit, it makes me a little sad to think
about them filling in the ground eventually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Hmmm... Maybe before they block it off,
I should take Kaisis to see the water below.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0038
rows.name:
He always seems like he has something to say,
but he just won't spit it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023501_MSG0039
rows.name:
He keeps saying he'll tell me once the city is finished,
but nuts to that! I'm just going to make him tell me![ST:wait ]
